text: I'm going to have to cut back on the caffeine.
Uh oh!  Who was supposed to pay the electric bill?
You're not supposed to be in here.
You're supposed to be afraid of me.
Why?  Are you supposed to be some kind of ghost?
I used to be a teacher at this school.  Do you want to know how I died?
Not really.  But, I guess I'm going to have to listen anyways.
I was protesting against the use of computers in education.
I was going to lie in front of a truck full of computers.  The truck was supposed to stop.  But, I got run over!
Tough luck! I guess you're going to have to get over it.
Now, I'm going to haunt this computer lab until students have to stop using it.
What do you have against computers??
There never used to be any computer viruses.  There never used to be any SPAM!  There never used to be any Internet PORN before computers!
Yeah!  You used to have to go to the convenience store to buy your girlie-mags... pretty inconvenient if you asked me!
Computers are bad for education. Students used to spend more time in the library!
Yeah!  It used to take all day to find the right articles for a research paper.  Now, all you have to do is a keyword search.  It only takes a couple of minutes.
Students used to spend more time listening to tapes to study a foriegn language.
Yeah!  And tapes used to be expensive too.  Now, you get all the listening material you want to hear for free on the Web.
Students used to listen to their teachers more.  Teachers used to be the source of knowledge for students.
Yeah.. but now information is easy for anybody to get, so teachers aren't so important.  What are you going to do? That's progress!
I'll tell you what I'm going to do.  I'm going to put a curse on this place and all of the computer geeks who work here!
Uh. You're going to have to get past our "Poltergeist Firewall" first.
Poltergeist Firewall?  There never used to be a Poltergeist Firewall in here!
You know?  You really ought to try to keep up with technology.
